verse.gurmukhi: BeI Bor iPir pkr mMgwXo ]
verse.unicode: ਭਈ ਭੋਰ ਫਿਰਿ ਪਕਰ ਮੰਗਾਯੋ ॥

en.bdb: The Raja sent his son to the prison and early next morning called him  back.
